definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
Islands District of the New Territories, Hong Kong

sentences.english: How many offshore islands are under the jurisdiction of Singapore?
sentences.chinese: 新加坡管辖的离岛有多少个？

sentences.english: Southern and Islands District Welfare Planning and …
sentences.chinese: 中西南及离岛区地区福利规划及协调。

sentences.english: The Department of Health also provides 25 beds for general out-patient clinics and maternity homes located in the outlying islands.
sentences.chinese: 卫生署也为离岛的普通科门诊和留产院提供25张病。

sentences.english: Issues of territorial sovereignty and self-determination for the Islanders are also in play.
sentences.chinese: 领土主权以及离岛人民的自决同样涉及其中。

sentences.english: Department of Health also provides 25 beds for general out-patient clinics and maternity homes located in the outlying islands.
sentences.chinese: 卫生署也为离岛的普通科门诊和留产院提供25张病。

sentences.english: The offshore duty-free policy for Hainan has been completed and submitted to relevant departments for approval.
sentences.chinese: 海南离岛免税政策已经制定完成并提交相关部门审批。

sentences.english: Local Delivery service is not available to outlying islands and villages.
sentences.chinese: 本地送货不包括离岛及鄕村。

sentences.english: This quota restriction, however, will not apply to outlying islands such as Kinmen and Penghu.
sentences.chinese: 但此一配额限制并不适用于离岛如金门和澎湖。

sentences.english: Perhaps the biggest challenge of all the beaches in the Outlying Islands District was Silver Mine Bay Beach.
sentences.chinese: 在芸芸离岛区泳滩中，银矿湾是我们的最大挑战。

definition: Kinmen or Quemoy islands off the Fujian coast, administered by Taiwan/Jinmen county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian, PRC
